card.title: Upload Your Blood Test Results

card.supports: Supports PDF, JPG, PNG files up to 10MB

list.title: What happens next?

list.line2: You can choose what type of recommendations you want
list.line3: Review and edit any extracted values

benefits.description3: Personal trainers, nutritionists, and wellness coaches who want to provide evidence-based recommendations to their clients.

aboutSection.title: About Lab AI
aboutSection.description: We're on a mission to democratize healthcare by making blood test analysis accessible, understandable, and actionable for everyone
aboutSection.caption: Our Story
aboutSection.text:
Founded in 2023 by a team of healthcare professionals, data scientists, and AI researchers, PlasmAI was born from a simple observation: most people struggle to understand their blood test results. We saw patients leaving doctor's offices with complex lab reports, feeling confused and uncertain about their health status. Traditional healthcare systems often lack the time to provide detailed explanations, leaving patients to navigate their health journey alone. 
Our AI-powered platform bridges this gap, transforming complex medical data into clear, actionable insights that empower individuals to take control of their health.
aboutSection.text1: To make healthcare more accessible and understandable by providing AI-powered insights that help people make informed decisions about their health and wellbeing.
aboutSection.text2: Your health data is sacred. We use enterprise-grade encryption and never share your personal information with third parties.
aboutSection.text3: Our AI models are trained on peer-reviewed medical literature and validated by healthcare professionals to ensure accuracy.
aboutSection.text4: Healthcare insights shouldn't be limited by geography or economics. We're making advanced health analysis available to everyone.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Lab AI Blood Test Analyzer ("Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our Service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: Lab AI Blood Test Analyzer is an artificial intelligence-powered platform that analyzes blood test results and provides interpretations. The Service is intended for informational purposes only and does not replace professional medical advice.

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
accounts.content: To use our Service, you must create an account using OAuth authentication (Google or LinkedIn). You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

conduct.title: 4. User Conduct
conduct.content: You agree not to: (a) use the Service for any illegal purpose; (b) attempt to gain unauthorized access to the Service; (c) interfere with the proper functioning of the Service; (d) upload any malicious code or viruses.

intellectual.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content, features, and functionality of the Service are owned by Lab AI Blood Test Analyzer and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

disclaimer.title: 6. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. WE DO NOT WARRANT THAT THE SERVICE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED, ERROR-FREE, OR COMPLETELY SECURE. MEDICAL INTERPRETATIONS ARE FOR INFORMATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: IN NO EVENT SHALL LAB AI BLOOD TEST ANALYZER BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF YOUR USE OF THE SERVICE.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting. Your continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

contact.title: 9. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at: support@labai-analyzer.com

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Lab AI Blood Test Analyzer ("we", "our", "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our Service.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect the following types of information: (a) Personal Information: name, email address, profile picture obtained through OAuth authentication (Google, LinkedIn); (b) Blood Test Data: uploaded test results and files; (c) Usage Data: IP address, browser type, device information, access times; (d) Cookies: JWT tokens for authentication.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your information to: (a) provide and maintain the Service; (b) authenticate your identity; (c) analyze blood test results using AI; (d) send you notifications about your test results; (e) improve our Service and develop new features; (f) comply with legal obligations.

storage.title: 3. Data Storage and Security
storage.content: Your data is stored securely using industry-standard encryption. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information. Access tokens expire after 15 minutes, refresh tokens after 7 days. Blood test data is encrypted at rest and in transit.

thirdParty.title: 4. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We use third-party OAuth providers (Google, LinkedIn) for authentication. When you log in, these providers may collect information according to their own privacy policies. We do not control and are not responsible for their data practices.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights (GDPR Compliance)
rights.content: You have the right to: (a) access your personal data; (b) rectify inaccurate data; (c) request deletion of your data; (d) object to data processing; (e) data portability; (f) withdraw consent at any time. To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@labai-analyzer.com

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies to store JWT authentication tokens. These cookies are essential for the Service to function. Access tokens are stored in httpOnly cookies for security. You can disable cookies in your browser, but this will prevent you from using the Service.

children.title: 7. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our Service is not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at: Email: privacy@labai-analyzer.com | Address: Lab AI Blood Test Analyzer, Kyiv, Ukraine
